short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live-update (auto-refresh) LetsRun.com threads and get notified when new posts come in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate to the end of any LetsRun.com thread and click the new button to enable live-updating for that thread. New posts will automatically appear at the bottom every 5 seconds, and you'll optionally receive desktop notifications for each post.
